mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.actual_date AS "actualDate", a.estimated_date AS "estimatedDate", a.actualproduct_date AS "actualproductDate", a.estimatedproduct_date AS "estimatedproductDate", a.actual_value AS "actualValue", a.estimated_value AS "estimatedValue", a.actual_payable AS "actualPayable", a.estimated_payable AS "estimatedPayable", a.product_id AS "productId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert:
insert into start_product
id, actual_date, estimated_date, actualproduct_date, estimatedproduct_date, actual_value, estimated_value, actual_payable, estimated_payable, product_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag,
#{id}, #{actualDate}, #{estimatedDate}, #{actualproductDate}, #{estimatedproductDate}, #{actualValue}, #{estimatedValue}, #{actualPayable}, #{estimatedPayable}, #{productId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy}, #{delFlag},
mapper.delete: update start_product set del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} where id = #{id}
update start_product set del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} where product_id = #{productId}
